name: FOMO
description:
HARIS RASHID, 2021

7 STAGES OF THE PANDEMIC: Fear of missing out, the lockdown restrictions are slowly being lifted up around the world and start seeing people enjoying the outdoors on social media. You feel so left out like your not living.

Life as we know has changed dramatically since the hit of the pandemic, pushing us to confront surreal norms and routines that we’re not used to. Reflecting on the process, it had sparked an interest for the artist to explore and comment on our adaptations and reactions of the pandemic based on his take of the 7 stages of grief (Hibernation, Media Consumption, Cabin Fever, Anger, Escape, FOMO and The Unknown).

Please visit www.pinktank.art for more information.
